title: Miss fortune texture glitches
body:
when {{champion:21}} joins the rift you get textures flying everywhere. when champions use their abilities the frames start to drop. pls fix

- FrogTerra

replies.body:
Hey FrogTerra -

If you're having issues like this, I may suggest doing a client repair. Files may get a bit jumbled due to us patching so frequently. 

You can do this by - 

* Run League of Legends
* Click on the '?' button that is located in the top right corner of the window
* Click Repair
* Wait. The repair function can take anywhere from 5 minutes to over 30 depending on the number of corrupt files it has to repair

Lemme know if you're still having problems after this. :)
